snippet: The Obama administration has begun an aggressive campaign to use approaching Supreme Court arguments on the new health care law as a moment to build support for the measure.
abstract: White House begins an aggressive campaign to use approaching Supreme Court arguments on the new health care law as a moment to build support for the measure, which is seen as Pres Obama’s signature legislative achievement; officials summon dozens of leaders of nonprofit organizations that strongly back the law to help them coordinate plans for a prayer vigil, press conferences and other events outside the court when justices hear arguments beginning March 26.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration has begun an aggressive campaign to use approaching Supreme Court arguments on the new health care law as a moment to build support for the measure.

headline.seo: White House Works to Shape Debate Over Health Law
headline.main: White House Works to Shape Debate Over Health Law
headline.print_headline: White House Set To Shape Debate Over Health Law

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
